text: Happy birthday to Donald Fagen, who was born on this day in 1948.
Happy celestial birthday to Walter Becker (born 1950)! Also on this day in 1974, Steely Dan released their third studio album, Pretzel Logic.
Steely Dan's eighth studio album, Two Against Nature, was released on February 29th, 2000.
Steely Dan's fourth studio album, Katy Lied, was released on this day in 1975.
May 19! Happy Steely Dan Day to all who celebrate!
Steely Dan's fifth studio album, The Royal Scam, was released on this day in 1976.
Steely Dan's ninth studio album, Everything Must Go, was released on this day in 2003.
Steely Dan's second studio album, Countdown to Ecstasy, was released this month in 1973.
Steely Dan's sixth studio album, Aja, was released on this day in 1977.
Steely Dan's live album Northeast Corridor was released on this day in 2021.
Steely Dan's live album Alive in America was released on this day in 1995.
Steely Dan's first studio album, Can't Buy a Thrill, was released this month in 1972.
Steely Dan's seventh studio album, Gaucho, was released on this day in 1980.
